thread.section_title: GoDaddy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDaddy | www.godaddy.com | 2 of 119
thread.title: Misty Forsman

author: Misty Forsman
title: Misty Forsman
text: Being able to connect with a live person 24/7 is extremely valuable to me and GoDaddy has been superb not only in the service they provide but my experience with Customer Service has been beyond superior! I could not manage without being able to call in orders, problems, questions, and more. I have been a customer for some time. All the services they have provided have been excellent and I am delighted to continue my working relationship with them.
